Looting.Errors.invalidDistance: The maximum distance for this interaction is: {dist} grids
Looting.Errors.thesame: the looting token is the same as the loot token

Looting.Settings.percentWeaponHint: Percentage chance of weapons in the NPC inventory not being looting (ie. too damaged for use)
Looting.Settings.percentEquipmentHint: Percentage chance of equipment in the NPC inventory not being looting (ie. too damaged for use)
Looting.Settings.percentConsumableHint: Percentage chance of consumable in the NPC inventory not being looting (too damaged for use)
Looting.Settings.removeItemHint: If enabled it removes items from the token (does not remove from the actor unless the token is linked)
Looting.Settings.interactDistanceHint: the maximum distance for players to interact with the lock in number of grids
Looting.Settings.lootSystemHint: Choose one of the ways to perform the loot (Soon)
Looting.Settings.lootEquipableHint: If disabled, the player can not loot equipped items, if enabled the player can loot items equipped but with an additional % of items in that condition
Looting.Settings.lootEquipableAgilHint: Percentage of additional chance of equipped item in NPC not to looting (ie. too damaged for use)
